column2: Akune-shi) is a city located in Kagoshima Prefecture
column3: Japan. The city was founded on April 1

column2: the city has an estimated population of 23
column3: 887 and a population density of 178 persons per km². The total area is 134.30 km².

column1: Akune has a humid subtropical climate (Köppen climate classification Cfa) with hot summers and mild winters. Precipitation is significant throughout the year
column3: especially the months of June and July.
